title: Hot mango chutney
ingredients: ['1 onion, finely chopped', '1 knob butter', '1 (425g) tin mango slices in syrup, drained', '30g preserved stem ginger, finely chopped', '225ml (8 oz) white vinegar', '115 g (4 oz) demerara sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons hot curry powder', '2 star anise', '2 cardamon pods', '1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1/2 teaspoon fennel seeds', 'salt and pepper']
